official_title: To amend section 502(h) of the Housing Act of 1949 to increase the maximum income limitation for borrowers of loans guaranteed under the rural housing loan guarantee program.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to increase the maximum borrower income limitation (from 100 percent to 115 percent of area median income) for guaranteed rural housing loans.

titles.title: To amend section 502(h) of the Housing Act of 1949 to increase the maximum income limitation for borrowers of loans guaranteed under the rural housing loan guarantee program.
